title: [The Blitz London April 1941]
other_title: Menzies R.G : Menzies Wartime Tour Home Movie
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Home movies and video
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Personal narratives, Australian
abstract: Robert Menzies' home movie of WWII London.
description: Sir Robert Menzies captures the atmosphere of London during The Blitz in 1941. Footage is shown of the West End including bombed buildings and empty street scenes. The way Menzies slowly pans up and down damaged buildings using his silent colour home movie camera shows his instinctive eye to record history. Source: Australian Screen Online
